name: The spiral of silence
description:
Introduction: You will play as a person own minor option than the mainstream. Try very hard to convince others though that won't help a bit. The game is Inspired by "The spiral of silence theory".

PlayTime:  about 5mins

The Game is made during GameJam but the English version is made after the jam. I made this all by by myself but the music. I am not a good English speaker so I you find sth weird in English. plz let me know ^_^.
